channel.title: Full Stack Python developer OR Front end PYQT GUI
channel.description:
**I am pleased to announce this position has been filled!**
**Full Stack Python developer OR Front end PYQT GUI**
REMOTE WORK in your spare time from your HOME – pay is negotiable
This role can be undertaken remotely so it doesn't matter where in the world you are based. As long as you have transferable technical skills and a good internet connection please feel free to apply.
Front End developer / UI (User Interface) Python/PyQt or C++ Developer / Programmer / Software Engineer with interest in cryptography and peer to peer networks
We are interested in finding and training a few cryptocurrency developers or people who want to be more familiar with the field. Bitbay has been established for several years and has one of the world's top developers working on our software.
We are the first company to offer decentralized peer to peer serverless markets and unbreakable contracts in a full-fledged contracting platform.
• The tasks would vary but would include redevelopment/ re-skinning our desktop application.
It would be helpful if you have a background in peer to peer networking, cryptography, network programming or security. It would be nice if you were familiar with design and UI/UX development. Working remotely, you will have to file reports on your progress and work in a fast and concise manner. You will also be able to learn a lot about the field and some of the secrets of the trade from one of the top cryptocurrency developers.
You will also be able to take part in a very large collaborative team effort and this will help you hone in on your skills.
please email your CV to aletha@bitbay.market our Recruitment Manager.
